alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 7:49PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carroll, east central Leflore and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 830 PM CST... At 749 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sidon, or near Greenwood, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Teoc around 800 PM CST. Malmaison and Coila around 805 PM CST. North Carrollton around 810 PM CST. Winona around 820 PM CST. Duck Hill around 830 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Carrollton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for north central Mississippi.
